content: What's the best resource to deeply understand how all pieces of async / await / futures / ... fit together and are implemented under the hood (ideally up to how the compiler handles these)?
Tokio's guide has a chapter on this: https://tokio.rs/tokio/tutorial/async
I would recommend the YouTube videos by jonhoo. They go in depth about async/await, pinning, executors, coroutines, etc.
this is one of the videos https://youtu.be/9_3krAQtD2k
Jon's book Rust for Rustaceans also contains an excellent section on this topic
